DemoPages.Title: View Types
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, day view, work week view, week view, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.
